items.key: (@@admin = 1 or ma_bp in (select a.ma_bp from hrbp a, @@sysDatabaseName..hrquyenbp b where dbo.ff_Inlist(a.bp_ref, b.r_access2) = 1 and b.user_id = @@userID)) and status = '1'
items.check: @@admin = 1 or ma_bp in (select a.ma_bp from hrbp a, @@sysDatabaseName..hrquyenbp b where dbo.ff_Inlist(a.bp_ref, b.r_access2) = 1 and b.user_id = @@userID)

command.text:
declare @i int, @p int, @d1 smalldatetime, @d2 smalldatetime create table #t(ky int, nam int, ngay_tu smalldatetime, ngay_den smalldatetime) select @i = 1 while @i <= 12 begin select @d1 = cast(str(@nam, 4) + replace(str(@i, 2), ' ', '0') + '01' as smalldatetime) select @d2 = dateadd(month, 1, @d1) - 1 insert into #t select @i, @nam, @d1, @d2
select @i = @i + 1 end
if @del = 1 delete hrky where nam = @nam and ma_bp = @ma_bp else begin if @type = 1 delete hrky from hrky a join #t b on a.nam = b.nam and a.ky = b.ky where a.ma_bp = @ma_bp else delete #t from #t a join hrky b on a.nam = b.nam and a.ky = b.ky where b.ma_bp = @ma_bp end insert into hrky (ky, nam, ma_bp, ngay_tu, ngay_den, so_ngay, datetime0, datetime2, user_id0, user_id2) select ky, @nam, @ma_bp, ngay_tu, ngay_den, 0, getdate(), getdate(), @@userID, @@userID from #t
drop table #t
